subject: Tennis
Candy
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova took time off from practicing for Wimbledon to introduce Londoners to Sugarpova, the candy line with labels like Flirty and Sporty that she unveiled last summer.
snippet: Maria Sharapova took time off from practicing for Wimbledon to introduce Londoners to Sugarpova, the candy line with labels like Flirty and Sporty that she unveiled last summer.
